channel.title: ::master
channel.description: i added ::master on my server and now when people go in wildy and there at like 20 hp they cna just use ::master and re heal there hp why isss this i even tried adding the in wild()) code thing and it wouldnt work plz help

item.title: ::master
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Zatko, post:3, topic:386011”]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”)) {
if (c.inWild())
for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
}
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
}[/quote]

! = Not

So, instead of “if (c.inWild())” put “if (!c.inWild())”

Your code is basically saying they can use the command only in the wild

By taking my code, you are saying if the player isn’t in the wild he can use the command.

Read full topic
